stimulusHtml: A parallel-plate capacitor has equal amounts of charge with opposite sign on each plate. Which of the following provides a correct statement about the electric field between the two plates?
choicesHtml: There is a constant uniform electric field everywhere between the plates.
There is a constant uniform electric field everywhere between the plates except for at the edges.
There is no electric field between the plates of the capacitor.
The electric field decreases farther from the positive plate.
